segments.text: The plumbing in my new apartment is not working .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need you to tell me what the problem is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The bathroom sink is stopped up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is the kitchen plumbing messed up also , or just the bathroom plumbing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just the bathroom plumbing seems to have a problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did this just start happening , or has it been going on for a while ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Everything worked beautifully until a few hours ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you going to be home so I can come by and take a look at the problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not sure if I will be home later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will be coming by around 10 this morning . If you aren ’ t there , I ’ ll just use my key .
segments.speaker: S2
